coded_answer.p: I want to inform you that I had already talkedhave already talked to Richard Brown and he informed me about the conference. Next week I will be start organising some events for this conference.

The eventevents will organizetake place at the Palace Hotel. The, the same hotel that will youyou will stayyou will be staying at. PalaceThe Palace Hotel is opposite the parkPark `Clifton'Clifton Park, which is near the college. We chose that hotel because is itit is near the college and we don't need to use a transport. Because you know where is the collegethe college is and you need to bring with me some things atfrom the college to the hotel, I think that it is better for to come all the groupall the group to come into the college and then we can go allall go together to the `Palace Hotel'. The conference startstarts at 9:00 o'clock, you need to be at the college half an hour before.

Concerning the end-of-conference party, I'm thinking about some dance and singing events. Tell me your ideaLet me know what you think. About the clothes that weyou need to wear, it must be your uniform, because it is the best conference toin London and every year are comingcome lectureslecturerslecturers come from other colleges.
Finally, on the last day, we have organised a seeing-crossingsightseeing tour around London. You will have the opportunity of visiting some museums and the zoo parks. I think it is a nice idea.
If you want more information you can call me, my telephone number is 047***. Please, if you have any more ideas, send me a letter.
NowdaysNowadays all the peopleeveryone havehas a telephone. TelephoneThe telephone is part of our life. It is one of the most important investigationinvestigationsinventions all over the world.

If you want to talk withto your friends, parents, partner oror partner to ask something, you can call them without wondering how you can be communicate with them. Today, with the development of technology, hashave been improved and the abilitiescapabilities of the telephonethe capabilities of the telephone have been improved. The lastlatest type of telephone, is the mobile phone. You can use it everywhere and at anytime.

Finally, the telephone, except|apart from being a typemeans of communication, is a typemeans andof socialisation. Nowadays whowe are sovery bussybusy and we don't have free time to see our friends, but we can call them and talk or chat with them.
